title: Ticket #7864: Add GPU support for blahp jobs
description:
We want to support gpu jobs for batch jobs in the grid universe. The blahp already has support in the upstream repository (https://github.com/prelz/BLAH/commit/444faae51cc89706d926a81699fe2842b8b94fbc). That should be imported to our repository. The codebases are different enough that it's not just applying a patch.

There's now a pull request for this change: https://github.com/htcondor/BLAH/pull/26
creator: jfrey
